Title: Regulates commercial finance licensing
Summary: Regulates commercial finance licensing; sets forth the application process for such licensing; makes conforming technical changes thereto.
LawCode: Ren Art 9-A to be Art 9-B, add Art 9-A §§363 - 363-n, amd §§22, 635 & 652-b, Bank L; amd §10-136, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to regulating commercial finance licensing
